        参数:
        i - (0-1)
        id - Faction id
        type - 0:Always, 1:Is, 2:IsNot
        stance - 0:Friendly, 1:Neutral, 2:Hostile

                   int value)
        参数:

        objective - Scoreboard Objective

        value - Scoreboard score value
